sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Azov brigade led a fierce three-month defense of Mariupol from the city's steelworks before being taken prisoner.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Their determination to hold out in desperate conditions earned them the admiration of many Ukrainians who gave them a hero's welcome on their return. They fought for Ukraine.
